page.title: 08PETER GABRIEL
page.content: Peter Gabriel is a parent of two children at Swainswick School, and is a famous pop star. He was very excited when he heard music, especially black music. He has a synthasizer and you can use it to record any sound, like a violin or cello or you can bang a chair or make a rude noise into it. He took a test a school and was told that he would make a good gardener. When he was l6 he did a concert in school and wanted to be a drummer more than a singer. His first song was "Sammy the Slug". He has written about 20 albums of music. At the moment he is working on a new L.P. He travels to London frequently and living in this area is very convenient. He became a pop star when he was 2l.He has helped us write a song called "Chimpey Chump".
